body:
Well, I´m having a problem with one driver, which don´t let me to play minecraft.
Card name: Mobile Intel(R) 4 Series Express Chipset Family (Microsoft Corporation - WDDM 1.1)
 Chip type: Mobile Intel(R) 4 Series Express Chipset Family

Well I have the problem with thie driver of this video-card.

Could anyone help me?

Thanks.

If you want/need more info, only say it on the post.
